title: chore(maintenance): implement TTLController for automated pod cleanup
description: Install a mechanism to automatically delete completed/error pods after a defined period. Approved by Patron.

title: feat(infra): implement Kustomize Components for DRY standards
description: Migrate shared infrastructure standards (probes, priorityClasses) to Kustomize Components to avoid folder hierarchy limitations.

title: fix(security): remove incompatible node-collector on Talos
description: Delete node-collector deployment as it is incompatible with Talos Linux (immutable OS, no systemd).

title: chore(maintenance): standardize revisionHistoryLimit across cluster
description: Set revisionHistoryLimit to 3 globally to comply with Kyverno policy and reduce cluster noise.

title: fix(monitoring): repair Goldilocks sync (immutable field conflict)
description: Re-deploy Goldilocks components by deleting existing deployments to allow ArgoCD to apply immutable label changes.

title: chore(robusta): connect Robusta alerts to Electra webhook
description: Configure a Webhook Sink in Robusta to forward critical alerts to Electra for automated processing.

title: fix(networking): add probes to External-DNS Gandi
description: Add Liveness and Readiness probes to External-DNS Gandi to prevent Kubernetes from SIGTERMing the pod prematurely.
